thread.title: Kanye West for president: Kim Kardashian had no idea about his plans
thread.title_full: Kanye West for president: Kim Kardashian had no idea about his plans | DailyTelegraph

author: Andrew Nodell
title: Kanye West for president: Kim Kardashian had no idea about his plans
text:
KIM Kardashian learned of Kanye West‘s political aspirations along with the rest of America.
In an interview with Ellen DeGeneres this week, Kardashian confessed her rapper husband didn’t confer with her before announcing his plans to run for president in 2020.
“That was news to me,” Kardashian , 34, revealed. “That wasn’t a discussion in our household. It’s a big thing not to talk to your wife about.”
 Speculation swirled that West made the shocking announcement during his VMAs acceptance speech on a whim, but Kardashian was unable to clarify whether the decision was spontaneous.
“I don’t know if that was planned and I just didn’t know about it or if he came up with that idea right then and there,” the expectant mum explained. “[But] I think it would be so much fun to be in the White House.”
West asserts his announcement was not a joke, telling Vanity Fair earlier this month: “I didn’t approach that because I thought it would be fun … No, the exact opposite … I’m like, ‘Wow, I’ve got five years before I go and run for office and I’ve got a lot of research to do … a lot of growing up to do.’”
This article originally appeared in the New York Post .
 Kanye didn’t tell Kim about presidential run
